result.title: Technology Evaluation, Containerization and Optimization Strategy
result.description: Based on the available requirements, this deliverable will derive a strategy for optimizing deployment in all envisioned dimensions: by optimizing libraries and runtimes, using containers, and application of emerging storage solutions.
